name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in building high-performance backend solutions using **.NET**, **C#**, **ASP.NET Core**, and **Entity Framework**. My technical expertise includes developing robust **Web API** services and employing testing frameworks like **NUnit** to ensure high-quality code. I have significant experience with **Git** for version control and am proficient in working with databases such as **MS SQL Server**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Oracle**. My background encompasses modern JavaScript and TypeScript frameworks, including **Angular**. 
In addition to my backend skills, I possess hands-on experience in full-stack development using **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, allowing me to support cross-functional teams effectively. I am well-versed in cloud environments like **Azure** and **AWS**, where I have implemented scalable solutions. My strengths in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation empower me to deliver secure applications that meet compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS.
